languages.text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушен{/g}, он значительно ограничен в своих действиях и способностях. В состоянии оглушения персонаж не может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} и совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Враги получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} на попадание по оглушенной цели.
languages.original_text: When a character is stunned, they cannot act normally. While stunned, the character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies receive bonuses to hitting the stunned target.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж оглушен, он не может действовать как обычно. В состоянии оглушения персонаж не может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклоняться{/g} и совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}. Враги получают бонусы на попадание по оглушенной цели.

Когда персонаж оглушен, он не может действовать как обычно. В состоянии оглушения персонаж не может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклоняться{/g} и совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}. Враги получают бонусы на попадание по оглушенной цели.

languages.text: When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушен{/g}, он значительно ограничен в своих действиях и способностях. В состоянии оглушения персонаж не может {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняться{/g} и совершать {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Враги получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} на попадание по оглушенной цели.

traits.locale_text: When a character is stunned, their actions and abilities are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive bonuses to hitting stunned targets.

When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.

When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.

languages.text: Wenn ein Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} ist, sind seine Aktionen und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} stark eingeschränkt. Solange ein Charakter betäubt ist, kann er nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen. Gegner erhalten außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf das Treffen betäubter Ziele.
languages.original_text: When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} ist, sind seine Aktionen und {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} stark eingeschränkt. Solange ein Charakter betäubt ist, kann er nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} ausführen. Gegner erhalten außerdem {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} auf das {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffen{/g} betäubter Ziele.

languages.text: L'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} entrave sérieusement les actions et les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du personnage qui en est la cible. Tant qu'il subit cet effet, il ne peut ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}, ni {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g}, ni lancer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. En outre, ses ennemis reçoivent des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui leur permettent de lui infliger des coups.
languages.original_text: When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.

traits.locale_text: L'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} entrave sérieusement les actions et les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} du personnage qui en est la cible. Tant qu'il subit cet effet, il ne peut ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g}, ni {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g}, ni lancer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. En outre, ses ennemis reçoivent des {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui leur permettent de lui infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coups{/g}.

languages.text: 当角色处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态时，他们的行动与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会被严重削弱。处于眩晕状态的角色无法{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，也无法发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。敌人攻击眩晕的目标时，会获得各种各样的加成效果。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}
languages.original_text: When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.

traits.locale_text: 当角色处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}状态时，他们的行动与{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会被严重削弱。处于眩晕状态的角色无法{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，也无法发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}。敌人攻击眩晕的目标时，会获得各种各样的加成效果。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}

languages.original_text: When a character is stunned, their actions and abilities are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive bonuses to hitting stunned targets.

languages.text: Cuando un personaje está {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, sus acciones y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} se ven muy limitadas. Mientras está aturdido, el personaje no puede {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} ni realizar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Además, los enemigos reciben {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} para impactar a los objetivos aturdidos.
languages.original_text: When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un personaje está {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, sus acciones y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} se ven muy limitadas. Mientras está aturdido, el personaje no puede {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} ni realizar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Además, los enemigos reciben {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} para {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} a los objetivos aturdidos.

languages.text: キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}している間は、行動と{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が著しく制限される。気絶している間、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができない。気絶しているターゲットを攻撃すると敵も{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}している間は、行動と{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}が著しく制限される。気絶している間、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を行うことができない。気絶しているターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}すると敵も{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Bir karakter {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlediğinde{/g}, eylemleri ve {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetleri{/g} ciddi şekilde kısıtlanır. Sersemlemiş bir karakter {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} yapamaz. Ayrıca, sersemlemiş hedeflere vuran düşmanlar çeşitli {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} elde ederler.
languages.original_text: When a character is {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, their actions and {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are severely limited. While stunned, a character cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Enemies also receive {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} to hitting stunned targets.
